divs: sighting details 1st jan 2001.0025hrs. i took a break from studyingand went outside to see if i could see the fireworks across the bay. sighted anobject (orange ball of light) ,thought it was a skyrocket at first, size approx1\2 size of little fingernail at arms lenght. realised almost too late- objecttravelling very fast , under 5000ft(approx)and was not a conventional aircraft.ran inside ,retrieved video,object now many kilometers away and still silent. focused on ball of light, used zoom, saw two clusters of lights with largeblank\black space between.some
